com.tsgrp.migration.event

Class HtmlToPdfConverterListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tsgrp.migration.event.AbstractListener
      • com.tsgrp.migration.event.HtmlToPdfConverterListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PostUpdateLogItemEventListener, SourceEndExportNodeEventListener, TargetBeginImportNodeEventListener, TargetEndImportNodeEventListener

    public class HtmlToPdfConverterListener
extends AbstractListener
implements SourceEndExportNodeEventListener, TargetBeginImportNodeEventListener, TargetEndImportNodeEventListener, PostUpdateLogItemEventListener
    Listener used to convert the content of an HTML file from a given node into a PDF file. This listener will retrieve an HTML file from the node and translate it into its string form, so that we can render the content of the HTML into a PDF readable version of the file. The listener can work on the content of the node, or external content indicated by attribute values on the node.

    • Method Detail

      • setUseNodeContentForInput

        public void setUseNodeContentForInput(boolean value)
        Injected, OPTIONAL. If turned on, the listener will convert the original HTML found on the node's content. Otherwise, it will evaluate the value of originalHtmlFilePathAttr to retrieve the content from a file path set on the node.
        Parameters:
        value -

      • setInputFilePathAttr

        public void setInputFilePathAttr(java.lang.String value)
        Injected, OPTIONAL. If attribute useNodeContentForInput is false, this attribute will be used to retrieve the original HTML content. Attribute that holds the ORIGINAL file path to the HTML file.
        Parameters:
        value -

      • setUseNodeContentForOutput

        public void setUseNodeContentForOutput(boolean value)
        Injected, OPTIONAL. If turned on, the listener will set the converted PDF on the node's content. Otherwise, it will evaluate the value of convertedPdfFilePathAttr to place the converted file on the specified file path.
        Parameters:
        value -

      • setOutputFilePathAttr

        public void setOutputFilePathAttr(java.lang.String value)
        Injected, OPTIONAL. If attribute useNodeContentForOutput is false, this attribute will be used to determine the file location in which to place the converted PDF content. Attribute containing a full file path where the CONVERTED PDF file will be placed.
        Parameters:
        value -

      • beginImportNodeEvent

        public void beginImportNodeEvent(MigrationTarget target,
                                 MigrationNode node)
        Fired just before each node import. Returns a boolean indicating whether the Listener has taken care of the import, or if the Target should continue as normal. The intention is that developers will use this boolean return to allow the actual import to occur in the listener. Return true to skip the target's import, or false to proceed as normal.

        Specified by:
        beginImportNodeEvent in interface TargetBeginImportNodeEventListener
        Parameters:
        target - The target we are importing into
        node - The node we want to import into
        See Also:
        TargetBeginImportNodeEventListener.beginImportNodeEvent(com.tsgrp.migration.target.MigrationTarget, com.tsgrp.migration.node.MigrationNode)

      • getHtmlFileReader

        protected java.io.Reader getHtmlFileReader(MigrationNode node)

        Parameters:
